channel.title: Adventures on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in Adventures on Yaya's World

item.title: 1. Meeting at Yawning Portal
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: All of my servants told me the Yawning Portal would be the best place to seek adventure. While I was not entirely sheltered by my parents, being my father's youngest daughter, ensured that I was not treated with the same freedom or independence as my eldest sister or my older brothers, but living under the shadow of my father's station, was cold and lonesome and I desired to see more of the world than our small keep.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Nagisa: Debut!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Nagisa is a little nervous about her online debut. Hopefully everything goes well.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: 2. A New Life in Trollskull Alley
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: While I can almost guarantee that the important details were all there, looking through my entry on how I met Ember and Tracie, I know there was much that was left out. To this end I have decided that I should begin to keep a daily journal of all of my actions. Even those that may be seen as mundane. I apologize for the somewhat rushed and lax presentation of my last adventures.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Nagisa: More Than a Voice
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Nagisa is a little nervous about her online debut. Hopefully everything goes well.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: The Journal of Keyrie Cildor
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I am Keyrie Cildor. I come from a privileged and noble line of wood elves. I am not large of stature, standing at only five feet and a single inch as measured by the humans, but I have a fierce heart for adventure. My eloquent flattery makes everyone I talk to feel like the most wonderful and important person in the world. The common folk love me for my kindness and generosity.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Non-gaming Adventures (General Fiction)
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I write things that are more original just like my art
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
